title: Sharks achieve first target
description: Their 27-9 Super Rugby victory over the Hurricanes may not have been pretty, but the Sharks achieved the first target they set themselves at the start of the season.

title: Anfield is a fortress - Allen
description: Liverpool midfielder Joe Allen believes Anfield has again become a daunting place for rival players after regaining its fear factor.

title: Boshoff new darling of Ellis Park
description: Lions pivot Marnitz Boshoff is fast becoming the darling of Ellis Park after his metronomic kicking proved to be the undoing of  their Super Rugby opposition for the second consecutive weekend.

title: No warm reception for Drogba - Jose
description: Chelsea will find it strange to  be up against their Champions League-winning hero Didier Drogba in their clash with Galatasaray, said manager Jose Mourinho.

title: Australia set big total to win
description: South Africa set Australia a target of 448 to win on the fourth morning of the second Test at St George's Park.

title: Lions annihilate pitiful Stormers
description: It's one thing beating a sloppy Cheetahs side; It's quite another annihilating the Stormers - a side packed with Springboks.

title: Rooney repaying Unitedâ€™s faith
description: Wayne Rooney showed how much he means to Manchester United with a goal of genuine quality to confirm a first away victory in 2014 for David Moyes's team.

title: England will miss KP - Wright
description: Luke Wright has spoken of his regret that the discarded Kevin Pietersen will not be part of their Twenty20 World Cup campaign.
